# Pilot Weekly Check-In

Weekly status template for a repository using agentic-best-practices.

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Project | {{PROJECT_NAME}} |
| Week Number | [Week N] |
| Pilot Owner | {{PILOT_OWNER}} |
| Reporting Period | [YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD] |
| Adoption Mode | {{ADOPTION_MODE}} |
| Standards Path | {{STANDARDS_PATH}} |

| Metric | Value | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- |
| AI-assisted commits this week | | |
| PRs merged with AI assistance | | |
| Blockers encountered | | |
| Critical defects linked to guidance | | |
